Posts.Content: Hi all  I have also been told by onc to not deny myself a life I have a boy who is 11 months and as asked if I could asytend mother and toddler group and she said yes as long as I don't cuddle other children in group then yes I was surprised by this as we all know kiddies are generally full of germs and not just cuddling other kids I thought the risk of gertms being in the air xx and also diet is no problem just restricted like pregnancy xx    Rhianon x.
